Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/59th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted  buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 59th, Morgan, 61st and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 59th, Morgan, 61st and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/59th.

Allow extra travel time.
